alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 29 at 2:14AM MST until December 29 at 3:00PM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MST /4 PM CST/ THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, with total snow amounts of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Portions of east central and northeast Colorado, northwest Kansas and southwest Nebraska. * WHEN...Until 3 PM MST /4 PM CST/ this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There may be ice underneath the snow on untreated roadways.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County
